fr.xebia.mowitnow

Class Lawnmower

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.xebia.mowitnow.Lawnmower

  • public class Lawnmower
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a lawnmover :
    - Its direction
    - Its position
    - The list of commands it has to run
    Author:
    Charles Dufour

      • getNextPosition

        public Position getNextPosition()
        Returns the "virtual" next position (after a move) based on the direction, without changing the current position. No position validation is performed.
        Returns:

      • move

        public void move()
        Move the lawnmower to the next position.
        Does not perform any position validation, this responsibility belongs to the lawn.
